propose and carefully analyze.from sentence: In this paper , spotlighting a well - studied core problem of NLP , we propose and carefully analyze a neural part - of - speech ( POS ) tagging model that exploits adversarial training .

BiLSTM - CRF model.from sentence: With a BiLSTM - CRF model as our baseline POS tagger , we apply adversarial training by considering perturbations to input word / character embeddings .
